headline: Edible Cookie Dough
description: This edible cookie dough recipe is egg-free and easy to make. Stash any leftovers in your freezer for an emergency sweet treat with or without baking.

video.description: Here's how to make edible chocolate chip cookie dough without the risk of Salmonella poisoning. This video guides you to making delicious cookie dough that you can eat straight out of the bowl. The perfect dessert when you do not have time to bake.
video.name: How to Make Edible Cookie Dough

name: Edible Cookie Dough

recipeInstructions.text: To heat-treat your flour so it is safe to use: Place flour in a microwave-safe dish and cook for 1 minute and 15 seconds, stirring it every 15 seconds. Set aside.

Beat sugar and butter with an electric mixer in a large bowl until creamy. Beat in vanilla extract and salt. Add heat-treated flour; mix until a crumbly dough forms. Stir in milk until dough is just combined; fold in milk chocolate chips and mini chocolate chips.

review.reviewBody: mine was too salty
I did NOT put my flour in the microwave and it's fine but I eat just regular cookie dough and it's fine. but this is really good cookie dough highly recommend!

It was delicious, the recipe itself is good but I made it without heat-treating the flour. I can omit the step for myself, but for others I don't know if it should be omitted. don't let it go! I take no responsibility! Feel free to try the recipe, it really is a miracle
It is phenomenal. I used Splenda brown sugar and it was great.
I forgot the chocolate chips and ate 4 servings in one sitting.
a lot of butter. more than needed.
It was a good recipe! didnt have butter on hand, was a little bit difficult i guess but i added a few things of my own and it turned out great! :)

I think this was a well thought out recipe which included what to do about making the flour safe to eat. It amazes me that there were so many comments about what to do with the flour before using it in the recipe. Did y'all not read the posted recipe in it's entirety? I microwaved the flour as directed and the grandkids did the rest. They had fun and we all enjoyed eating it. Making this a five star recipe by my standards.
Absolutely amazing! And super simple to make!
This recipe was really fun and I enjoyed making it with my family. It was a good treat to have.
I absolutely loved this recipe! I’m so happy because I refrigerated it over night, and it was still really good to eat in the morning. Really fun to make and tastes really good!

It was not the best cookie dough in the world. I would not make it again. Definitely recommend following instructions. Look at a cook book to find a good cookie dough recipe. sincerely - Pete and Johan
Personally I would really recommend this as an essential snack for any party.
Perfect! Made it with almond milk and it still tasted great! :)
to much salt
Cookie dough was apsultly amazing I was looking to make somthing with out an oven and I looked up cookie Dough and when I made it it taste amazing and it looks amazing !
It tasted great but it could have been a little more doughy. I might have added too much milk, though.
Works really well! My family loved having this sweet treat….. I’ll be making this again!😆

SO good, I eyed most of what I put in, except the flour and sugar of course, and it turned out so delicious. Me and my friend made it together and my dad, brother, her, and I love it so much. Definitely making it again.
I thought it was great but I saw that there was not a lot of chocolate chips, so I added more
way way too much salt and idk if i did something wrong but it was not a dough at all, it was so runny and again tasted so much of salt when i measured everything perfectly even triple checking

Delicious! I followed the recipe exactly, but also added sprinkles. It tastes just like the edible cookie dough at the shop in my town that charges $5 for one little scoop. So happy to have found this!
I loved this recipe but I do recommend that you don't use coffee creamer as a milk substitute because it tastes a little strange 😅
texture was good but it tasted like flour. not sweet enough, couldn't finish eating it.
Addicting!
it is yummy but makes a BUNCH of cookie dough
Mmmm my favorite

I've made it several times, but being a T2D, I had to sub some things, such as using a brown sugar sub found pretty much everywhere; coconut flour instead of regular/AP flour (it is NOT a 1:1 substitute, and requires additional liquid, which I did); and I added stevia-sweetened chips. It came out just as delicious as the original version does, and was safe for me.
Pretty good ngl it was a great midnight snack just little things could be improved
Really delicious 🤤

I’m pregnant and craving cookie dough. I have a toddler who’s sleeping and I can’t just got but some edible cookie dough. This recipe lowkey isn’t it. It taste a lot like flour. It’s also very wet. I don’t know that the milk is necessary.
The texture was way too "wet" and it tasted too strongly like vanilla. Disgusting
Very for good dessert. Love it.
Amazing!! Tastes just like cookie dough! Only it safe to eat! I'll definitely add a little less butter next time, unless you like the flavor of butter add a little less than 1/2 cup...

Really good recipe. I tried it many times, really delicious and easy to make. Easiest way to treat the flour Put the amount of flour you need, microwave for 30 second, mix around for a while to remove heat spots and then microwave for another 30 seconds. Hope this helps. 😀
Just would like everyone to know that they need to heat treat the flour in the oven or microwave beforehand to eliminate the risk of salmonella!:)
I loved this perfect for when your in a snacking mood!
Wasn’t enough for two - inedible, American - unclear instructions. Now have salmonella. Not happy
good
Absolutely amazing. I treated the flour so it wasn't dangerous. Please update the recipe to say it must be heat treated flour.
10 TIMES BETTER THAN OTHER RECIPE I TRIED
make sure to never use raw flour!!! pls look at the other comments that tell u wat to do so u dont get sick from the flour
loved it! I didn’t have chocolate chips, so i used colorful sprinkles and it was delicious. It was just the sweetness i needed for my everyday-craving!
It was super good,tastes a tiny bit like flour but its real yum
Omg so gooo

Almost right. You should bake the flour at 350 for 5 minutes to make it safe to eat. Youll need about 1 and 3/4 cup of flour but cook 2 cups to be safe. (I spread it out flat on a baking sheet with parchment paper 1 cup at a time) I used margarine instead of butter so that may have effected how much flower i needed. I also spooned in the flour a few tablespoons at a time till i got the right consistency. Taste test and adjust to your liking if needed. (Taste testing will help you avoid that "flowery" taste) Add a little bit more brown sugar if its too buttery (the flour will probably hide that too) i was able to get it to actual dough consistency without the flowery taste with this method.
I've made it a few times but I love it every time, don't eat to much at a time though it'll make you sick.

Great recipe! I made them really good. Had to put them in the freezer for 30 minutes to make them not sticky. But other then that it was great. I would suggest using this recipe best cookie dough I have made 👍
I added double vanilla and it tasted better

Omg. This tastes great! Fast, easy recipe for any occasion. Just please make sure your flour is pasteurized, i put mine in the microwave for two minutes, stirring in between so it didn’t clump up. Eating raw flour can get you sick, do be careful. But besides that, It was amazing!
Use soft butter it is easier to mix
i made em but put sprinkles instead of chocolate chips, its yummy but i didnt microwave the flour. oops 😬😬 whatever i aint wasting all of these ingredients and it still tastes good
If it helps you can add food colouring. It’s probably the best edible cookie dough I’ve ever had so I do recommend you try it for your self

My family loved this recipe but thankfully to some of these reviews I learned that you need to treat the flower to get food poisoning but thankfully one of these comments helped me and so I hope this can help one of you guys as well all you need to do is. Play some flour in the microwave for one minute and then take out and stir it and then put it back in for another minute

Honestly love this recipe it is so yummy and delicious. I later kept it in the fridge to stay good it and it was still amazing , overall it’s great to make, and to have fun. It’s easy and great to make with children! Totally recommend this!
It was horrible. It only tasted like flour and we followed every direction right. Would not try!
It was good but I found it salty.
I loved this recipe. It was full of flavor!
You guys lied lol, it only took me and my friend 4 minutes and 40 seconds to complete this recipe. Anyway, this cookie dough was out of the world🚀🪐🛸! Happy 4th of July!!🇺🇸🤗
It was a bit to soft and not really dough like so I put some regular sugar and corn starch in it and it helped, I also froze it.
it was really good!
yummy
Added more milk
I find this recipe very useful but have one thing to add you should probably heat treat your flour before hand by microwaveing it for roughly 30 secs to reduce bacteria but otherwise great
I added a little bit more milk and didn’t add chocolate chips but was otherwise really good and easy to make
I love it

The flower should be heated in the microwave in bursts until it reaches 160 degrees F to insure all bacteria has been killed. Skip this step and you could be doing the hokey pokey all the way down the hallway.
To 2Twinkies1Cupcake Shut up this is the best recipe ever Also, you need so much needed guidance
it was great I loved it!
it was ok, it was lacking flavor and was really dark and it was really dry
It was really good and met my cravings. Super easy to make, definitely will be making more in the future.
I added acup of instinct coffee
very good I added rainbow sprinkles and mini chocolate chips.
I added a bit more flour, but apart from that it was really good! A nice afternoon snack.
It was AMAZING!! We added a little extra vanilla for added sweetness. A little salty, but still perfection:)
good soup
It was very good. Something that would make it better would be if you add nuts.
Oh my gosh this works so well! usually when I do recipes or follow them they end up all liquidy and not good but this was the perfect consistency!

Well, if it looks like a duck, walks like a duck talks like a duck it just might be a really good decoy. Well you can't make a duck dinner with just a decoy. So, I am calling it chocolate chip decoy dough.
I loved it and so did my family. It has a great texture and taste and I would definitely recommend it!
I loved this recipe! thank you so much!

Overall this recipe is pretty good! I gave it 4 stars. Although for some reason, my cookie dough did come out a little slimy looking? When I came back to eat some, there was a small amount of liquid that had separated from it. Weird... Didn't affect the taste at all. Tastes great.
So good! I will be making this again!!! Make sure to heat the flour until it is 160 degrees or for at least one minute to eliminate risk of salmonella! Thanks have a great day

Super great! Made a lot more than expected, my dad who is very picky about his cookies said it was the best cookie dough he’d ever had. Though I did add around a 1/4 cup of white sugar because I just found it a little odd to not have it in there, added a bit more (really just over a teaspoon) of brown sugar and flour (that I had cooked before hand, please don’t use raw flour) to make the consistency better. Was super fun and easy to make and I will most definitely be making again!
YUCK I'm sorry but I think there was too much butter and we ended up having 3 tablespoons of milk instead of 2. Would not recommend.
my cookies to not turn out like any other cookies I've ever seen this with the worst cookie recipe I've ever had and made them watery and made him look nasty and it tasted awful

It's good! I did have to add some extra flour, and I always like to add more vanilla! I also used oatmilk so I could share with my dairy allergy son. It's just one of those things you have to add a bit of this and that to your liking. Glad to know about cooking the flour from previous comments, I honestly didn't know that. I had to pull myself away from it so I can share with my husband after work! We are going to put it on some ice cream!
Made this dough and made 2 cookies 1 was stuffed it with Nutella and choc cookie with white choc chips
Great recipe! However, you have microwave the flour first for 1 min. tasted very good, but very sweet. I cut down a bit on the sugar
Very tasty and fast to make!

THIS IS AN EXTREMELY IMPORTANT NOTE: i haven't seen any reviews addressing this, and the recipe doesn't either, and i don't want someone to make this mistake. when adding your vanilla extract, i BEG of you, do NOT use pure vanilla extract. pure vanilla extract contains a minimum of 35 percent alcohol, the same proof as captain morgan rum. when you bake it, the alcohol gets cooked out. but since this is raw, you'll essentially be getting drunk off cookie dough. a one-star review said that their throat is "still burning" after eating this, and it's likely because they used pure vanilla extract. please use imitation vanilla extract if you plan on making this, as it contains no alcohol!

anyways, all in all, the recipe was really good, and i recommend it a lot! i'll probably be making it again another time
It was good! I think there could be a little less brown sugar. A little overpowering.

It was good, but heavy in salt. I made four servings and 1/4 of a teaspoon seemed like a lot (maybe because I accidentally put in more). To make it less salty, I added some granulated sugar and then it was great! So much cheaper than another recipe that I had tried which required sweetened condensed milk.
I loved this recipe and I recommend it to everyone who wants to learn it too.
It was so delicious that I ate it all in n half an hour. Recommend this to anybody!

author.name: k a z u m i s a m a

review.reviewBody: My parents love it, so 10/10.
This has the perfect texture and taste we like, just the right sweetness and saltiness. The only thing is we don't like so many chips, so I only added the regular and not the mini.

Pretty tasty! If you're like me and your dough was still all crumbly post-milk: what I did was put it all in a plastic bag and mush it around. Turned it into the right consistency easy peasy! Then you can scoop what you want into a little dish and store the rest in the freezer.
The first time i made it tasted like flour.i tried a recipient in the comments and it was a lot better
